content: round 5 k2 *mb k5 repeat from * to three infinity scarf version sts before m k3 rround 6 knit round 7 knit round 8 knit *note about when to change yarn i only changed one yarn at a time staggering the changes across the project when to change yarn is entirely up to you let the yarn dictate by knitting until one ball runs out or make stripes by changing colors more frequently you can also create a fade effect by gradually replacing yarns with the next shade darker or lighter throughout the project your imagination is your only limit i hope you have as much fun as i did playing with color whimsy &co
